external_games.name: Rise and Conflict: Rule the Civilized Empire

name: Rise and Conflict
summary: "Rise and Conflict" is a medieval real-time strategy game. Set SLG and RTs in one, and at the same time realize the global PC and mobile players to fight together in all directions. Embedded real-time translation function, to achieve global barrier free communication, during the online period, there are a lot of welfare to send, let you one-step in place, have a good time!
